scripts.build: npm run build-64 && npm run build-win32 && npm run build-linux32
scripts.build-64: npm run build-mac && npm run build-win && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-mac: electron-packager ./ '1A Downloader' --app-bundle-id=the1adownloader --icon=images/appicon.icns --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.9 && cd 'build/1A Downloader-darwin-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../1A.Downloader-darwin-x64.zip '../1A Downloader-darwin-x64' && cd ../../
scripts.build-win: electron-packager ./ '1A Downloader' --app-bundle-id=the1adownloader --version-string.FileDescription='1A Downloader' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.9 && cd 'build/1A Downloader-win32-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -r ../1A.Downloader-win32-x64.zip '../1A Downloader-win32-x64' && cd ../../

scripts.build-linux: electron-packager ./ '1A Downloader' --app-bundle-id=the1adownloader --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=1.0.9 && cd 'build/1A Downloader-linux-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -r ../1A.Downloader-linux-x64.zip '../1A Downloader-linux-x64' && cd ../../
